original_text: Five of you will chase a hundred, and a hundred of you will chase ten thousand, and your enemies will fall by the sword before you.
korean_text: 또 너희 다섯이 백을 쫓고 너희 백이 만을 쫓으리니 너희 대적들이 너희 앞에서 칼에 엎드러질 것이며

sentences.original_text: Five of you will chase a hundred
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 다섯 사람이 백 명을 쫓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and a hundred of you will chase ten thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 백 사람이 만 명을 쫓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and your enemies will fall by the sword before you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 너희 앞에서 칼에 쓰러질 것이다
